ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics
Class EditCommentActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.InspectCommentActivity
          ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.EditCommentActivity

public class EditCommentActivity
extends InspectCommentActivity

EditCommentActivity is called when a user is in the "My Comments" activity and selects that he/she wishes to edit a comment by clicking on it. This source code will allow the user to modify any field that he/she wishes and even take a new photo if they want too.
